title: Plate, "The Swing", ca. 1927
markings: Marks: On underside: 3444 incised in clay; unidentified painter's mark [?] hand-painted in green underglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Large, circular, with scene of a peasant girl and young soldier on swing in pastoral setting; glazes predominantly green, yellow, red, separated by cloisonne-like ridges

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "The Swing", ca. 1927.
ca. 1927. earthenware, glaze. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-29.
